who is alspur?

Reading time ~1 minute

Hi. I’m Alex Spurrier, an education policy and data expert living and working in Branford, Connecticut.

My academic background is in economics and public policy. Professionally, I’ve been a classroom teacher, an advocate for policy change, and a data and policy analyst.1

I spend my free time enjoying life with my wife (Samantha) and dog (Bailey). I follow my family’s tradition of coaching on the lacrosse field.2 I also train for and particpate in GORUCK Events.

  1. Disclaimer: The views expressed on this blog are mine alone and may not reflect the views of organizations I’ve worked for. ↩

  2. No, I’m not related to the Ol’ Ball Coach. ↩
